name: Back to school // Pencil Case // red and green
description:
This pencil case has the same colors as strawberries!

Design is simple and carefully finished. It has embroidered green stripes and a green zipper.

It is made from strong red leatherette, ideal for school, university, or to be used as beauty case.

This item is made from new and selected materials.

Size: 22 x 12,5 cm (ca. 8.66 x 4.92 inches)

name: Luxurious leatherette MonsterCase - white and gold - extra finishings
description:
Luxurious MonsterCase, made with soft white leatherette worked with diamond shaped embroidery.

Elegant case-pochette white and gold, extremely soft to touch, with big black eyes and a golden zipper.

This MonsterCase is carefully finished, on the inside edges and along the zipper edge as well.

This cute monster is suitable even for the most elegant occasions!

Size: ca. 15 x 23 cm (ca. 5.9 x 9.0 inches)


Materials: leatherette, metal zipper, plastic buttons, cotton thread

*
Wholesale orders: contact me for timing and prices.

name: "2 Face Time": a philosophical and soft pillow handmade
description:
This philosophical pillow is literally double-faced: one side is a happy young face, while the other side is an old bearded face.

This pillow customizes sofas, armchairs and beds, with a hint of irony!

The two mouths are two pockets in which you can hide candies, keep tissues at your fingertips, or just to keep your hands warm!

Materials: fleece, peluche fabric, leatherette, polyester thread, metal buttons, polyester stuffing.
This item is made from new and selected materials.

It measures 29 x 25 x 16 cm. (ca. 11.4 x 9.8 x 6.3 inches).

» Want a pillow that portrays your face, your family, your girlfriend, your pet, your favorite rock star? For custom pillows, don't hesitate contact me: I will be happy to provide you with your unique piece handmade! «
